forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 55F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 16C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 61F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High around 55F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low near 45F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
